SELECT p.prod_no , p.prod_title, p.prod_content, p.prod_total_sell , p.prod_price, p.prod_cate_code, TO_CHAR(p.prod_reg_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS prod_reg_date, p.prod_del_yn, p.prod_user_id, u.user_name AS prod_user_name, atch.ATCH_FILE_NAME AS prod_img_file_name, atch.ATCH_PATH AS prod_img_file_path FROM products p LEFT JOIN users u ON p.prod_user_id=u.user_id AND p.prod_del_yn = 'N' LEFT JOIN ATTACH atch ON p.prod_no=atch.ATCH_PARENT_NO AND atch.ATCH_CATEGORY = 'prodImg' WHERE 1=1
AND p.prod_title Like '%' || #{search.searchWord} || '%' AND u.user_name Like '%' || #{search.searchWord} || '%'
ORDER BY p.prod_no ASC

SELECT p.prod_no , p.prod_title, p.prod_content, p.prod_total_sell , p.prod_price, p.prod_cate_code, TO_CHAR(p.prod_reg_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS prod_reg_date, p.prod_del_yn, p.prod_user_id, u.user_name AS prod_user_name, atch.ATCH_FILE_NAME AS prod_img_file_name, atch.ATCH_PATH AS prod_img_file_path FROM products p LEFT JOIN users u ON p.prod_user_id=u.user_id AND p.prod_del_yn = 'N' LEFT JOIN ATTACH atch ON p.prod_no=atch.ATCH_PARENT_NO AND atch.ATCH_CATEGORY = 'prodImg' WHERE 1=1
AND prod_cate_code Like '%' || 'CL' || '%' AND prod_cate_code Like '%' || 'FD' || '%'
ORDER BY p.prod_no ASC

SELECT prod_no, prod_title, prod_content, prod_total_sell, prod_price, prod_cate_code, TO_CHAR(prod_reg_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS prod_reg_date, prod_del_yn, p.prod_user_id, u.user_name AS prod_user_name, atch.ATCH_FILE_NAME AS prod_img_file_name, atch.ATCH_PATH AS prod_img_file_path FROM products p INNER JOIN users u ON p.prod_user_id = u.user_id AND p.prod_del_yn = 'N' INNER JOIN ATTACH atch ON p.prod_no || '' = atch.ATCH_PARENT_NO AND atch.ATCH_CATEGORY = 'prodImg' WHERE p.prod_no = #{prodNo}
